fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At any point in the day, you may reveal yourself. Once you do, EVERY player will be allowed to submit an unlimited amount of votes during every day phase, but they are forced to submit one vote at a time. (Saying "Vote Rasen 100 times" only counts as 1 vote)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you reveal, Majority will be 100x the amount of players.
- You have Hang Immunity, but only after revealing yourself.
- If you die after being revealed, voting goes back to normal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang at least 3 members of the Town after revealing yourself. Town Hangings before you reveal don't count.
